title.abbrev: Networked Information Retrieval: Tools and Groups

front.title: A Status Report on Networked Information Retrieval: Tools and Groups

author.organization: University of Newcastle upon Tyne, Computing Service

abstract.t: The purpose of this report is to increase the awareness of Networked Information Retrieval by bringing together in one place information about the various networked information retrieval tools, their developers, interested organisations, and other activities that relate to the production, dissemination, and support of NIR tools. NIR Tools covered include Archie, WAIS, gopher and World Wide Web.
